title: Fox Footwear Presents | The Motion Varial
description:
The Motion Varial fuses athletic footwear technology, construction, and comfort with the best in casual footwear styling. This is lifestyle reimagined.

• Modern athletic construction and MX heritage elevate this casual style.
• Mesh instep provides breathability, and the unique cage structure provides support while reducing weight.
• Fox Motion technology provides superior cushion, comfort, and flexibility, while drastically reducing weight.
• Decoupled outsole features nine Motion flex grooves for a level of flexibility that is unmatched in the category.
• Duratrak MDT outsole for excellent grip and durability.

Music: 
Artist: Pretty Lights 
Song: Still Night 
Album Title: Glowing In The Darkest Night 
Red Light Management

asset.author: Fox Head
